title: Sentinel-2 Color Infrared Imagery
description: Sentinel-2 color infrared (CIR) imagery uses near-infrared, red, and green bands to highlight vegetation health, land cover, and water features by displaying healthy vegetation in shades of red. This band combination enhances the contrast between vegetated and non-vegetated surfaces, making it valuable for monitoring agriculture, forestry, and ecological change.
